list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Hydrogen is a dangerously explosive gas.

list_definition.definition: (a) material that is likely to explode

list_ex_of_english: In experiments using plate impact or high explosives, strain rates up to 10 5 -10 6 s 1 are reached.

I gather that there will be several substantial dumps of weaponry, explosives and detonators.
The forensic experts come later to analyse what specific explosives were used.
The need for explosives and munitions has fallen.
Is it true that they have been waiting for two years for explosives to clear the entrance?
Test borings have been taken, pits have been opened by explosives and rock samples have been analysed.
Explosives with a light covering will not affect anything like the amount of traffic which has just been mentioned.
